captions.text:
Filmed with hidden cameras
on the Italian Riviera
Good. Go inside and get your uniform.

Stand in the middle so you're ready,
in case I have to go away.
Under the hood it's a sports car

Introducing Volvo FH
with I-Shift Dual Clutch

comments.text:
Now, if he's playing Euro Truck Simulator (which I'll be playing soon) 
parking this truck would be a piece of cake. I've driven a bus before but 
not a truck. If I'll be given a chance I'd like to play this prank on our 
very own hotel valets. Their reactions could be priceless. ﻿

non è male.﻿

La riviera italiana. Un hotel di lusso. Un ragazzo incaricato di 
parcheggiare le auto degli ospiti. E una piccola sorpresa ad attenderlo. 

*Guardate il video e se vi piace commentate e condividete.*

comments.author: Dubai Telecom

comments.text:
My roommate used to drive eighteen-wheelers.  At times she would drive the 
tractor part home.  One night I suggested that we take the tractor down to 
the local trendy nightspot and give it to the valet.

Alas, it wasn't her truck (belonged to the company she worked for) and she 
didn't dare (insurance reasons, etc).  But we both agreed that it would be 
amusing to watch the valets try to cope with eighteen gears.

comments.text:
Hey Guy, I see in your profile you empower people. Do you have any advice 
for me. I need to have a luxurious life, and unlimited usage of things that 
make me happy. A job won't do that, what is the real secret. It isn't hard 
work, I tried that. what really is it ? I donate money when I have it, and 
that seems to bring back good returns, but how do I get to real freedom?
